document.full_text: the fbi on sunday identified a recently paroled bank robber as the man suspected of planting a bomb at a crowded shopping mall near columbine high school last week on the 12th anniversary of the school massacre.
document.title: paroled robber suspected of planting bomb near columbine
lines_and_colors: the fbi on sunday identified a recently paroled bank robber as the man suspected of planting a bomb at a crowded shopping mall near columbine high school last week on the 12th anniversary of the school massacre.
